title: Kimi to Kemono na Yume o Miru
description:
Kimi to Kemono na Yume wo Miru (Watching the Beastly Dream with You):
At first glance, Izumida Riko looks like a neat girl, and she’s known as the "Credit Union's Madonna". However, she's the impulsive beast girl who can even stop robbers. Aiming at Riko is a guy whom she met during her morning run. Is their meeting really by chance, or because of 'duty'?!

Also included:
Kimi no Kawaii Doku Ouji (Your Cute Poison Prince)
Musesouna Aporo (Inconstant Apollo)
Motto Ranbou ni Aishite mo, Ii yo (It's Okay to be More Violent in Love)
Migite no Bonno Atashi no Kodou (Right Hand's Lust, My Palpitation)
